item.description: There is a $12 cover charge to get in that includes the beginner/intermediate lesson that begins at 9pm. There is a inexpensive parking garage (I think $1/hr) right next door. No partner required!! Come learn to dance and mingle!!
item.why: This is a fun way to meet people as well explore new things. You can socialize, learn and new dance and have a fun time!!

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Salsa dancing (with lesson)
